Articles.Content:
Hello

I have been testing the mod JSAT by @Jiraiyahand I have run into a little problem. It seem like the Scancom is not present at all when I have it at lauchpad. I made the assumption that the JSAT folder is put into Game Data as most of the mods. However, the ModuleManager that came with the zip.file was different to the one I use (version 2.7.6). Is my version of ModuleManager causing this problem?

If any of you have tested the mod or have any input in this matter, please leave a comment.

Thank you.
Use the most recent version of MM, and dont have muliples of it in GameData. If the problem persists, ask in the JSAT thread.
